arts.ttl: Peru beats Bielsa's Uruguay 1-0 in South American World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: Peru has won its first match in South American World Cup qualifying at the expense of coach Marcelo Bielsa’s Uruguay. Miguel Araujo scored the only goal of the match with a header in the 88th minute to move Peru out of last place in the South American standings .

arts.ttl: Uruguay FA boss backs Bielsa in Suárez dispute
arts.sum: Uruguayan Football Federation president Ignacio Alonso pledged his full support to Marcelo Bielsa despite confirming the declarations made by Luis Suárez over the problematic working conditions imposed by the head coach.
